definitions.definition: A merry-go-round ( type of ride on rotating platform ) .
A continuously revolving device for item delivery.
examples: After collecting his suitcase at the baggage carousel , he left the airport.

definitions.definition: The rotating glass plate in a microwave oven .
A visual component that displays a horizontal series of items one at a time.
An equestrian discipline in which groups of riders make various formations .
A tilting match or tournament accompanied by games , shows , and allegorical performances .
Synonym of jukebox ( “ automated carousel for the storage and retrieval of tapes, CD-ROMs, etc. ” ) .

main_definition: A merry-go-round ( type of ride on rotating platform ) .
secondary_definitions: A continuously revolving device for item delivery.
The rotating glass plate in a microwave oven .

An equestrian discipline in which groups of riders make various formations .
( historical ) A tilting match or tournament accompanied by games , shows , and allegorical performances .
( computing ) Synonym of jukebox ( “ automated carousel for the storage and retrieval of tapes, CD-ROMs, etc. ” ) .
